name: Skywalker
description:
In Skywalker you run and jump among the clouds, but after every two levels, they get joined together and give you an all-new challenge.

This game was made for the GMTK game jam

Use A and D or the arrow keys to move side to side

Press Spacebar to jump

This was my first ever game jam game so there's probably a lot of bugs.

Thanks for playing!
